title: Scargill Moors Roman shrines
description: A complex of two Roman shrines to the god Vintonus on Scargill Moor, near Bowes in County Durham.

properties.description: Coordinates derived from Pastscape record and converted to WGS84 latitude, longitude values from the Ordnance Survey grid references, resolved to their center points.
